items.sentence: I told Tom that what he was doing was illegal.
I translated everything Tom wrote into French.
I tried to tell Tom, but he refused to listen.
I want an answer from you as soon as possible.
I don\'t want to know what\'s going to happen.
You should\'ve started with simpler questions.
You shouldn\'t hang out with people like that.
You shouldn\'t spend more money than you earn.
You think you know me pretty well, don\'t you?
Tom invited Mary over to his place for dinner.
